article.description:
Jeremy Crouch scored 22 points, including
eight during a 24-10 spurt midway through the second half to lead
Bradley to a 73-64 win over Virginia Commonwealth on Saturday
night.
article.headline: Bradley uses 24-10  run in second half to oulast VCU
article.linkText: Crouch (22 points) propels Bradley over VCU
article.story: RICHMOND, Va. -- Jeremy Crouch scored 22 points, including eight during a 24-10 spurt midway through the second half to lead Bradley to a 73-64 win over Virginia Commonwealth on Saturday night. With the Rams leading 38-36 with 18:24 to play, Crouch hit a turnaround jumper in the lane and a 3-pointer to ignite the run that ended with Bradley (19-10) leading 60-48 with 6:48 remaining. Virginia Commonwealth (22-6) had an 11-0 run midway through the first half taking a 22-14 lead. Bradley eventually fought back to a 34-32 lead with 22 seconds left before T.J. Gwynn's 3-pointer gave the Rams a 35-34 halftime lead in the ESPN BracketBuster matchup. Daniel Ruffin added 19 points for Bradley, Zach Andrews had 12 and Will Franklin had 11. Jesse Pellot-Rosa led Virginia Commonwealth with 14 points, B.A. Walker added 12, Michael Anderson and Jamal Shuler each had 11, and Gwynn had 10.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
